ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Tavatron growled uncomfortably when Dinobot looked at her, as if staring into her eyes would reveal some past she wished to remain hidden. Tavatron continued

Tavatron growled uncomfortably when Dinobot looked at her, as if staring 
into her eyes would reveal some past she wished to remain hidden. Tavatron 
continued to look away when she heard Liono's transmission over her com.

Tavatron transformed (to R.M.) and turned to go down a different hallway. 
She thought for a moment, wondering if she would be there, in the ark, 
prepared to defend it, if she had not met Primal all those stellar-cycles 
ago.

She looked back at Dinobot. He had defected too, but something was different 
about him. As if he hadn't had a choice. Tavatron sighed inwardly, she did 
think too much:

"Sound's like we're needed on the field. Care to accompany me to the 
weapon's hold?"
